mapper.insert: insert into question (qu_id, qu_details, qu_answer, qu_type, qu_point, qu_grade) values (#{id}, #{details}, #{answer}, #{type}, #{point}, #{grade})
mapper.update: update question set qu_details = #{details}, qu_answer = #{answer}, qu_type = #{type}, qu_point = #{point}, qu_grade = #{grade} where qu_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select qu_id, qu_details, qu_answer, qu_type, qu_point, qu_grade from question where qu_id = #{value}
